sections.title: About Me
sections.content: I am S√ºleyman Fatih ‚Äî a developer and designer who enjoys producing at the intersection of technology, design, and systems. I focus on transforming ideas into functional and visual solutions, handling projects end-to-end with my own perspective.

sections.title: Areas of Interest
sections.content: I am interested in system and network management, software infrastructure, graphic design, UI/UX design, and web technologies. I focus on creating functional, sustainable solutions by combining technical infrastructure with visual aesthetics.

sections.title: How I Improve Myself
sections.content: I constantly focus on learning and self-improvement. I follow current technologies, build personal projects, and develop solutions based on real-world needs. I believe learning should be supported by hands-on practice rather than theory alone.

projects.name: 3 Quarter Classroom
projects.description: A personal educational project focused on system administration, networking, and Linux. All content production, visual identity, video editing, narration, and brand structure are created by me. The project aims to present technical knowledge in a clear and accessible way.

projects.name: GNU/Linux PNM OS
projects.description: A personal operating system project based on Arch Linux, focused on performance and simplicity. System configuration, package management, desktop customization, and user experience are entirely developed by me. Created to deeply understand and optimize Linux architecture.

design.title: Graphic Design
design.description: I create visual works where design is not only aesthetic, but also a form of communication.
design.career: With over 6 years of experience, I have produced logo designs, corporate identities, digital content, and print materials. My goal is to create designs that balance aesthetics and functionality.

systems.title: Systems & Network Management
systems.description: Projects focused on Linux-based systems, automation solutions, and infrastructure development.

projects.name: NetInstall Combo
projects.description: A lightweight and modular installation framework that enables automated and clean installations of Arch Linux, Pardus, and Gentoo from a single ISO. Features a customizable interface and multi-distribution support with a total size of only 45 MB.

projects.name: System Notes & Documentation
projects.description: A collection of technical notes and documentation focused on Linux, system administration, networking, and terminal-based solutions. Built around real-world usage and practical scenarios.
